titles.title: Don't You Know It's Time To Praise The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Don't you know it's time to praise the Lord
In the sanctuary of his Holy Spirit?
So set your mind on Him,
And let your praise begin.
And the glory of the Lord will fill this place.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord. (men)
Praise ye the Lord. (woman).
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He lives within the praises of His people.
He loves to hear us call upon His name.
So set your mind on Him,
And let your praise begin.
And the glory of the Lord will fill this place.
